title: The Online Art Revolution
description: Mike Steib, CEO at Artsy, speaks with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about the art market's digital evolution during the pandemic and trends in buying art online over its 10-year history.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Mike Steib, CEO at Artsy, speaks with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about the art market's digital evolution during the pandemic and trends in buying art online over its 10-year history.
